meanings.sent1: Her agrypnia kept her tossing and turning all night.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her agrypnia after several sleepless nights.
meanings.sent3: His agrypnia made him resort to counting sheep in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent4: The city's agrypnia was evident in the bustling nightlife that never seemed to end.
meanings.sent5: The agrypnia of the owl allowed it to hunt for prey under the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: The baby's agrypnia kept the whole household awake.
meanings.sent2: Agrypnia can have a significant impact on one's daily functioning.
meanings.sent3: The agrypnia of the town was so extreme that even the roosters were tired.
meanings.sent4: The agrypnia of the stars was a reminder of the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The agrypnia of the forest at night was broken only by the occasional hoot of an owl.
